div.p: This small game will help you to test your knowledge about your saved words. You will get 10 random words from your personal list in finnish and have to type the translation of it into the text field. You don't have to give all possible translations, you'll get a point if at least one of your translation words is correct. If you give more thatn one translations, seperate them with a whitespace. To get a hint, hover over the 'hint' button and you'll get the first three letters of the first translation. To go to the next vocabulary press Enter or 'submit'. Good Luck!
